price: 39. Sé paciente con lo que dicen (quienes rechazan la verdad, ¡oh, Muhammad!) y glorifica a tu Señor (rezando) antes de la salida del sol y antes de su puesta,
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ ٱلۡغُرُوبِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika qabla ṭulūʿi al-shamsi waqabla al-ghurūbi
